attributes.action: explain to the British people the proposed mechanisms to allow the voting public to elect the full-time EU President.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is abundantly clear that the EU commission has little intention of allowing the public a say in the election of the new EU President. Unlike the US, there are no pan-european parties. There are considerable problems with different languages and cultures. Will this be another "shoe-in" for a failed politician? Since the role is being elevated to the most powerful in Europe surely, in the name of democracy, the people must have the final say. Or is democracy in Europe dead?
